meanings: (짖궂게 놀리거나 재미로 하는 짓) [명사] (재미로 하는 짓) fun, (농담) joke, (어린아이들이 하는 못된 짓) mischief,...

vlive.korean: 오케이 오케이 - 아 장난이었어요? Okay. - Were you kidding? 듣기 View video BTS : [Full] BTS Comeback Special: '보'이는 '라'이브 '해'요
아 장난이었어? 아이 뭐야~ Ah you were joking? What is this?? 듣기 View video VICTON : 월요일밤!!병찬이랑
vlive.english: Ah you were joking? What is this??

vlive.korean: [운명의 장난] 내가 부숴 먹었어 어제! [A quirk of fate] I ate it up yesterday! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [A quirk of fate] I ate it up yesterday!

vlive.korean: 장난 아닌데? 왜 이렇게 잘해? You're so talented. How come you're so good at this? 듣기 View video MAMAMOO : 🌙달이 태양을 가릴 때🌙
vlive.english: You're so talented. How come you're so good at this?

vlive.korean: 들어왔다 근데 얼굴 그림자 장난 아닌데? It's on. But what's with the shade on the face? 듣기 View video TWICE : 아레나 투어 마지막 공연🎶👀
vlive.english: It's on. But what's with the shade on the face?

examples.korean: The kids were ducking each other in the pool. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아이들은 수영장에서 서로를 물 속에 밀어 넣으며 장난을 치고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: Stop playing with your food! 듣기 Add to Wordbook 음식 가지고 장난 그만 해! Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: It was all innocent fun. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 모두 악의 없는 장난이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
